      <any> ping(java.lang.String xCisClientRef)
      Checks if service is functioning and connecting with current credentials.

      • ping

        <any> ping(java.lang.String xCisClientRef)
        Checks if service is functioning and connecting with current credentials.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        Returns:
        A result with details of the connection
